EmailTemplate.subject: Your link to the guide "Automation Testing on Mobile" by Pivotal Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Download Your Free Guide from Pivotal Labs <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL-Report-QA-Automation-Testing-on-Mobile-Q214.pdf>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in our guide "Automation Testing on Mobile".
Please click here to access the guide <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/PL-Report-QA-Automation-Testing-on-Mobile-Q214.pdf>.
If you have any questions, reply to this email and I'll respond right away.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
